tool_description: Generates engaging social media content including text, captions, and content suggestions based on specified topics, brand voice, and platform requirements.

topic.description: Main topic or theme for the content

platform.description: Target platform (facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

content_type.description: Type of content (post, story, reel, video, carousel, poll)

brand_voice.description: Brand voice style (professional, casual, humorous, inspirational, educational)

character_limit.description: Maximum character count for the content (50-10000)

keywords.description: Keywords to incorporate in the content

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Invalid content type: Content type must be one of [post, story, reel, video, carousel, poll]
Character limit exceeded: Generated content exceeds the specified character_limit
Invalid brand voice: Brand voice must be one of [professional, casual, humorous, inspirational, educational]
Topic too vague: Provide a more specific topic for better content generation
usage: Specify topic, platform, and content_type as minimum requirements. Optionally customize with brand_voice, target_audience, character_limit, include_cta, and keywords for more tailored content.

content_text.description: Generated text content for the post

caption.description: Suggested caption if different from main content

character_count.description: Total character count of the generated content

suggested_media.description: Suggestions for accompanying media or visuals
